column1: We find that the pattern of E2F and pRB - related polypeptides recruited to these promoters changes in a strikingly dynamic fashion as cells progress from quiescence into G ( 1) and S phase: Repression of each promoter in quiescent cells is associated with recruitment of E2F - 4 and p130 and low levels of histone acetylation, but by late G ( 1), these proteins are replaced largely by E2F - 1 and E2F - 3, in concert with acetylation of histones H3 and H4 and gene activation.
